patthana7.5:1.1: Nasaṅkiliṭṭhasaṅkilesikaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nasaṅkiliṭṭhasaṅkilesiko dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā …pe….
patthana7.5:2.1: Naasaṅkiliṭṭhasaṅkilesikaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca naasaṅkiliṭṭhasaṅkilesiko dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā …pe….
patthana7.5:3.1: Naasaṅkiliṭṭhaasaṅkilesikaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca naasaṅkiliṭṭhaasaṅkilesiko dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṃ.)
patthana7.5:4.1: Hetuyā ekūnatiṃsa, ārammaṇe catuvīsa …pe… vipāke ekavīsa …pe… avigate ekūnatiṃsa.
